project_abstract.cdata: The project has the broad objectives of improving the utilization and management of water resources and urban transport services in Liaoning Province, an important industrial base in China.  The specific objectives are to: (a) improve water supply conditions; (b) improve traffic and public transport conditions; and (c) improve measures for water pollution abatement. The water supply component will develop physical works, including transmission and distribution pipelines, water intake works, pumping stations, and water treatment works.  It includes a study of water resource and water supply pricing.  A water pollution control component will provide technical assistance for a study of industrial wastewater treatment and environmental regulations.  In addition, equipment will be acquired for environmental monitoring.  The urban transport component, will improve about 44 km of arterial road corridors, and provide equipment, technical assistance and training to support management of public transport operations, in particular, road and public vehicle maintenance, road safety measures, and operations management.  Technical assistance will be included in the project to assist in planning and design of a second phase of the investment program, focusing on water pollution abatement.

P003460.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>辽宁城建项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的总体目标是提高中国重要工业基地辽宁省的水资源和城市交通服务利用水平，加强水资源和城市交通服务管理。具体目标是：（1）改善供水条件；（2）改善运输和公共交通条件；（3）改进水污染控制措施。供水子项目将开展工程建设，包括输配水管网、取水口工程、泵站和水处理工程。该子项目还包括水资源和供水水价研究。水污染控制子项目将为工业废水处理和环境法规研究提供技术援助。此外，将采购环境监测设备。城市交通子项目将改造44公里左右主干道，并将提供设备、技术援助和培训，以支持公共交通业务管理工作，特别是支持道路养护和公交车维护、道路安全措施和运营管理。本项目将提供技术援助，协助以水污染控制为重点内容的二期投资项目的规划和设计工作。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
